70.customerMessage1: I didn't receive my recent purchase. It says delivered but the photo appears to be a different house
70.AgentMessage1: Braun: I'm so sorry about this. If your tracking says the package was delivered but you haven't received it, I recommend checking around your home and with nearby houses, just in case it was dropped off by mistake. Also, check with anyone you live with, like family, roommates, or a landlord, to see if they accepted it for you. Sometimes packages are also held by property managers, an apartment office, or even your local post office. Let me know if you can't find it, I'm here to help!
70.customerMessage2: I've done all of this and unfortunately nothing has shown up. The picture is obviously a different house but the address on the package was correct. Doesn't even resemble the appearance of a house in our neighborhood
70.AgentMessage2: Braun: I'm really sorry for the inconvenience. Can you please share your order number and email so I can check on this with the team?
70.AgentMessage3: Braun: Thank you for getting back to me and providing that information! Could you confirm the email address you used to place the order as well?
70.AgentMessage4: Braun: Thank you! Let me check on this with the team and I'll text you back once I have an update, please hang tight!
70.AgentMessage5: Braun: You're welcome, I'll keep you posted!
70.AgentMessage6: Braun: Thanks for checking in. I haven't heard back from the team yet, but I'm keeping an eye on it and will update you as soon as I get some news. I appreciate your patience, and I'll make sure to keep you posted! Let me know if you need anything else in the meantime.
